ComicInfo.Summary:
Heritage of Horror! [The Art of Julian Daniels!]: Weird events occur when Julian Daniels puts brush to canvas.
Devil-Music!: A beautiful young singer discovers what brings evil to life.
This Ship Is Doomed!: The Indies Queen and its passengers were destined for disaster.
Vengeance of the Ouanga!: Bob Grant carried a dead killer's good luck charm - the bones of a hand and arm - which leads to terror.
ComicInfo.Title: Heritage of Horror! [The Art of Julian Daniels!]; Devil-Music!; This Ship Is Doomed!; Vengeance of the Ouanga!
